root.str: Apply the Ink Spots camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Use melee weapons to kill enemies who are wearing Halloween Masks or Facepaint.

Designates a target for the connected OS uplink. For valid acquisition, the target must be no less than 200 meters from the uplink, fall within its current strike range (displayed on the map), and be within visual range of the designator.
Terrify your enemies with this Pipe Organ Horn. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 100%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shells.
Apply the single use Northern Forest camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> It's a pity that the team got wiped out like that. Not sure if their research would have won the war, but I'll make sure it gets to our scientists so that we can find out.
Allows Heavy Weapons to be used in the secondary weapon slot. Does not include Directive reward weapons. Heavy Assault only.
This customization adds a Glowing White decal to the cockpit glass. The cockpit glass will illuminate at night. TR use only.
Receiving small arms fire while your shield is active will occasionally heal you.
Unlock all 41 camos available in the store at a huge discount with this Mega Weapon Camo Bundle!
Reduces the acquire timer of the Vanguard by 540 seconds.
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Earn this service ribbon by harvesting Cortium
Could not kick player from the squad.
Adds the Rhino style hubcaps to your Flash. VS use only.
While active, a barrier forms around the ANT, reducing incoming damage by 30% to the top, sides, front, and rear of the vehicle. Drains 160 Cortium per second.
Apply the Scales camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Single Use India Scrub Armor Camo
Apply the Stripe camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Adds Hubcaps VS004 to your Flash. (DNT)
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon will cloak you for 1 second. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.

Desperate to gain footing in the war on Auraxis, Terran Republic brass has entrusted Field Officer Knightly to find soldiers willing to carry critical data to Bio Labs planetside before the other factions can uncover the truth about Esamir.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Gold Tiger Fins. All factions can use this gear.
Provides a component used to create Exceptional Implants in the Implant Foundry.
Adds the Gold Outlaw S4 Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
This customization adds a Olive decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Adds the Outlaw S4 Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.

For marksmen that prefer to not put themselves directly in the fray, the Nanite Systems Quadra scope allows users distance between themselves and their intended targets. The Quadra comes equipped with a simple crosshair at 4x magnification.

This prismatic variant of the Scorpion rocket launcher fires an air-burst payload that showers explosive bomblets upon those below. All factions can use NS weapons. <font color="#dc9c36">Hold fire in-scope to set detonation distance. Release to fire.</font>
Your faction must successfully win the Meltdown Alert on Esamir and lock the continent
Drifter Jump Jets allow the user to glide for long periods of time, but lacks the vertical thrust of other jump jet types.

Killing an enemy has a 10% chance to give you and squadmates within 25 meters 20% increased frontal armor for 3.5 seconds. Does not stack with Safeguard. MAXes can equip and trigger this implant, but cannot receive the buff it offers.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Reaver Inertial Dampener - Level 5
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 grenades.

The NSX Sesshin was intended as a multi-class platform that filled an aggressive, mid-long range combat role, though it was eventually set aside as company resources shifted in favor of developing the Daimyo and Tomoe.
Adds Hubcaps to the Sunderer. VS use only.
Headshot kills grant 25% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>
Flat on the Floor Vehicle Decal
Allows the user to carry and place additional C-4.
Apply the Zebra camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Interact with others to earn rewards.
Apply the Arid Forest camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Enter the Proximity Range of an Elysium Drill
Reduces cooldown of Spitfire Auto-Turret by 15 seconds.
Constructs a small garage suitable for protecting a deployed Sunderer.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Repair generators at ally containment facilities
An experimental recon vehicle with hover capabilities, allowing it to quickly traverse all types of terrain.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. TR use only.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
The Saron Laser Cannon is the standard nose cannon for the Vanu Sovereignty's Scythe. Its balanced reload, magazine size, and rate of fire allow it to adapt to any situation. VS use only.
Maintain lattice connection to an enemy Warpgate.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 1160 rounds.

The Escalation Update is here, and with it brings new strength, strategies, and social space.

  • Visit Sanctuary, a new social hub containing vendors, friends, and foes alike.
  • Join an Outfit to access the new War Asset system, and call in support from on high.
  • Summon the mighty Bastion Fleet Carrier and wreak havoc on the battlefield.
  • And compete in the new Outfit Wars competitive mode.
This customization adds a broken glass decal to the Mosquito's cockpit.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership because you are not the platoon leader.
Victory has not eluded us! Fight harder!
Use these keys or your mouse wheel to switch to your other weapons and equipment.
Increases the speed at which your shields recharge to full by 45%, and reduces the delay before your shield begins recharging by 1 second.
Earn a Gold Medal on 5 different carbines.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rockets.
We have refunded the Infiltrator's Proximity Mines to fix a medal tracking issue. You will need to repurchase this skill line.
Adds 13 rounds to the default magazine size.
The reliable TX1 Repeater's 3-round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range. This variant features a unique gold plating. TR use only.
Apply the Starburst camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Apply the Desert Tile camo pattern to your armor.
Increases the targeting angle of the rocket launchers lock-on capability by 50%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rounds.

Can only be activated if the driver is an Infiltrator. Activate to cloak the Flash. Cloaking the Flash makes it and the riders nearly invisible, breaks lock-ons, prevents it from being spotted but also prevents it from firing. Lasts until fuel is consumed or turned off.
Time to get back into the fight. Use the Warpgate Terminal to head planetside. The Field Commander will brief you on arrival.
Speak with an Officer from your empire.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Prowler for 1 hour. Rank 6 required.
VS Patriot Flare Gun Auraxium Medal
Celebrate the legacy of PlanetSide with this Oshur themed bundle! This bundle contains weapons for all factions, and cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.

This rack of anti-air missiles lock onto enemy aircraft, unleashing a barrage of four havoc warheads. On impact, mechanical targets will be affected by a destabilizing field that prevents them from being repaired for up to 6 seconds. TR use only.
Most spawn rooms have a teleporter that will take you to another part of the base.
Allies who are below 300 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
<font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> Umatherin, pleased to be armed with the beautiful simplicity of her newly acquired data, grants the soldier a boon in return.
Capture Esamir within the time limit
Prevents the display of profanity from other players in chat. (Default: On)
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 600 seconds.
Apply the Snakeskin camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Places a barrier shield that protects allies from small arms.
Reduces damage taken from small arms and heavy machine guns by 20%.
Heal or revive allies as a Medic
The M60 Bulldog fires high explosive 60mm rounds with a large blast radius effective against infantry. Direct hits provides some damage to armor. All factions can use this weapon.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 44% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
Increases the roll rate of the Mosquito by 4 degrees/second.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> This is definitely where the researcher landed. You should check out the area.
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
A standardized Infrared scope that allows high visibility in low light situations.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 bombs.
The Proton EMP is an effective electromagnetic pulse plasma cannon. EMP plasma rounds can only damage shields but will also disable enemy deployables such as land mines.
The Nanite Systems Crosstalk Electromagnetic Pulse Cannon inflicts damage to shields and disarms enemy deployables such as land mines.
Destroy the Shield Console in the Medical Wing
This terminal is disabled. Repair the Terminal Power Source.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Fogbreach Headlights for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 210 rounds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Robgoblin Hood Ornament.

The dumbfire-capable Striker AE houses a six-round magazine of compact, heat-seeking rockets that will home in when within proximity of enemy aircraft. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Proximity Seeking: Aircraft</font>
Engineer: Kill 50 turrets with your turrets
You are forbidden from using the video upload system.
You do not have access to this vehicle.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 6.5 minutes.
Skill set line for the pistol
NC6S Gauss SAW S: Auraxium Medal
Increases the rotation speed of the Prowler by 14 degrees/second.
Applies a camo to your vehicle. NC use only.

Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 0.5 seconds, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 3 seconds. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>
Apply the Lightning Strike camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> The containment facilities are of vital importance to our military efforts across Esamir. So, gear up and get out there.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Hello, operative. I'm Representative Foster of Nanite Systems. Apologies for not greeting you in person. Your command has offered your services to help with reconstruction efforts on Esamir. I'll explain.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Unlock various gadgets for the Lightning's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 26 shells.
After a short charge-up, this experimental particle projection weapon fires a dense photon blast that shreds heavy armor on impact. NSO use only.
Improves the efficiency of the Nanite emitters, increasing the maximum duration the shield can remain active to 13.5 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> You know what, boyo? I've got a bad feeling about this. Mayb- [COMMUNICATIONS DISCONNECTED]
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Inertial Dampener 5

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Alright, our techs tell me that these facilities draw in an incredible amount of power from the storms that were ravaging the area. They want to utilize that energy, so they need you to locate the marked power circuits and calibrate them to reroute it. Don't worry about the technical stuff, the egg heads tell me it it's as simple as holding a button.
Adds the Supercharged Intake to the Galaxy. TR use only.
Customize the colors of the map regions.
Turning this off will toggle off the active mission display. (Default: On)
An auraxium water balloon ornament, proudly displayed on the hood of your favorite vehicle.
The TR Triumph Flare Gun fires a variety of entertaining flare patterns. TR use only.
Could not set squad recruitment flag at this time.
This customization adds a Grey decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
As a part of the Chimera's initial rollout, it was given an all-rounder 20mm heavy chain gun capable of combating threats of all types. NSO use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Great work soldier! Contract closed.
Kill players tracked by the Outdated Network Terminal
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> The lockout expired. Gonna have to hit the main terminal and start over.
Today Only! "FB" Edition Faction Pistols Available!
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to DarkGreen.
Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 40%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

The use ability key is used by some classes to activate their special class-defining ability, such as the cloaking device for the infiltrator, the shield for heavy assault, or the group-heal for the combat medic.
Adds 6 round to the default magazine size.
Apply the Sakura camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Get a bulk discount with this sale bundle!
Further increases the MAX's fire rate while in Overdrive.
Increase maximum strafing speed and reduce how quickly you accelerate and decelerate while strafing.
The arid continent of Indar is home to multiple biomes, providing unique challenges for its combatants.
Improves the top speed and acceleration of the Galaxy.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> Let us not forget the part you played in scouting the Containment Sites, contributing supplies and resources necessary to build the facilities, and your own research into harnessing the power of the storm.
The 150mm Cannon AP fires armor piercing rounds that are capable of inflicting heavy damage to armored targets

Generates a decaying shield of nanites 6 meters around the soldier that mitigates 25% damage to nearby allies for up to 8 seconds. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Next rank increase cloaked recharge rate and time cloak can remain active when stationary: Completely drained energy recharges in 18 seconds. Cloak can remain active while moving for 13 seconds.
Consumes nanites to bend light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Nanites regenerate over time.
Outfit: Hack a base with a full squad of Outfit members
Liberator Clip Size TR PH 04: Increases magazine by blah
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.

When your shield is broken, you gain 20% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds. Additionally, whenever Failsafe is on cooldown, receiving melee damage will shock the attacker for 150 non-lethal damage.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> Great work soldier, they'll have a hard time sifting through all that junk data.
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Mosquito by 10%.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Magrider. VS use only.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 490 rounds.

The Terran Offensive Rifle Extended was designed to provide easily controllable recoil without sacrificing stopping power.
A custom title for the Planetside 2 Reddit Community Award winner.

Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Air vehicles can resupply at aircraft landing pads.
Deploys an Anti-Vehicle Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players. VS only
Next Rank: Increase fuel regeneration. Fuel will recarge from zero to full in 20 seconds
Get a selection of Reaver weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price!
We've captured a new spawn point.

Get the Advance Intel Bundle III to gain access to new weapons before they hit the Depot!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.

Could not add squad to platoon.
Nanoweave armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart
The duration the cloak can remain active is increased to 8 seconds and the charge time when depleted is decreased to 11.5 seconds.

Activate PlayStation Plus and gain 50% more experience!

Apply the Intertwined camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Mosquito by 480 seconds.
Powered exosuits swinging heavy MAX weaponry have proven to have devastating effects on soldiers unfortunate enough to get in the way.
Earn points by holding Construction Site Epsilon, Mossridge Command Center, Outpost Lambda, or Nason's Defiance.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Damaging friendly target dummies in VR Training does not give grief points.

Become acting Captain of your outfit's Bastion. Make movement and attack commands with the Waypoint system.

Only one Bastion per Faction per continent may be active at a time. Will be destroyed when all hardpoints are eliminated. Lasts for up to one hour.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70 rounds.
We've defused the bomb at the Western SCU!
Apply the Abstract camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
The Militant's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Removes the arming distance from each projectile, causing them to explode on impact no matter the distance. Use with caution.
The Wayland Long Range Optic is easily configured for various magnifications. This optic amplifies magnification by 7x.
This platinum variant of the snub-nosed Underboss revolver features a faster rate of fire and more controllable recoil than the bigger NS-44 Commissioner. All factions can use NS weapons.
Adds hubcaps to the Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 385 rounds.

Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.

Equipped squad boosts also grant a boost to other players in your squad. These are cumulative with each player with a squad boost equipped!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Router Spire is out of Cortium
Upon activation the MAX is anchored to the ground, increasing fire rate, reload speed, and projectile speed by between 25%-40% depending on the weapon system.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 7.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.

Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Alpha Squad Boost: Increases resource and XP gain by 50%

NSO characters are only available to players above Battle Rank 20.
These characters are assigned to fight for the lowest populated empire on the continent.

Membership subscribers may choose to align with and fight for one empire. This alliance also allows members to join outfits within that empire. Members can change their empire alliance at any time in the Sanctuary.
Adds the Baron style hubcaps to your Harasser. NC use only.
Drag a squad member here to create a Platoon.
Adds the Goliath style hubcaps to your Harasser. VS use only.

Aerospace resources can be used to obtain air vehicles.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160.
<font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> After enjoying the thrill of living vicariously through the soldier, Nalla delivers her reward.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> So, it seems that the cargo is a little on the unstable side. I'm going to need you to get that thing to the drop point with a little pep in your step. Oh, and it should go without saying, but just to be clear. Don't die or lose the vehicle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 9 shells.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Adds this customization to your vehicle. Only TR can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Great job, soldier. The check is in the mail.

<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> Your work on Esamir may be near its end, operative, but the forces set in motion here must continue to their inevitable conclusion. In time the tides will return to the sea.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Air Officer:</font> Request for fighter launch acknowledged. Standby.
Unlock various gadgets for the Prowler's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Unlocks a profile banner for your character. All factions can use this item.
Customize your Harasser with armor plating. VS use only.

Activate to repair 10% of the vehicle over 5 seconds. Also prevents the vehicle from overheating when firing during that time. If the vehicle is on fire or overheating when activated, it will also immediately remove those effects. Can be activated once every 50 seconds.

Overheating occurs when firing the primary weapon while deployed into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 0.5 seconds and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Deploys the lightly armored Flash XS-1, a single-passenger vehicle designed for rapid deployment anywhere on the battlefield.
Further increases the MAX's fire rate while in Overdrive.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
A squad has left the platoon.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "V" Gold Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 144 rounds.
Apply the Plasma camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Destroy Space Pumpkins, Galact-O-Lantern kills are worth 10 kills toward this directive.

USE
Find a Colossus Terminal at a warpgate or tech plant under your control.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Reserved Asset permissions.

The Colossus is a heavy tank armed with a dynamic Mammoth Cannon primary weapon and four secondary weapons for defense. In addition, the Colossus can deploy into an anti-air skylance battery capable of piercing the hull of a Bastion Fleet Carrier and damaging its weak points.

Max 4.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Daredevil Voice Pack. TR Male use only.
Premium Tier 2: +28.8 Daily Passive Cert Points
Customize your Lightning with armor plating. VS use only.
Apply the single use Amerish Forest v2 camo pattern to your vehicle.
Allows use of the mid-range 4x TMS scope.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 200 meters.
This controls how loudly special effects, such as explosions, play. (Default: 1.0)
Option for the Passive system slot. Land mines are automatically spotted when the vehicle comes within 10 meters of them. [WIP]
Activate to repair 20% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 48 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Welcome to the Containment Site, soldier. Start by getting to know the facility. We should know how bad things are before starting on repairs.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 35 rounds.
Customize your Flash with the Rail Guard. NC use only.
Skull-themed camo. For NC use only.
Hitting a friendly will lower your points!
The ally activity filter shows a blue heat map of friendly players.
The Vanu Sovereignty has defended Allatum!
Reduces the time required to establish a lock-on with the weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "8" Hood Ornament.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner</font> Delivery received, operative. We will alert you when new shipments are required.

Now that you are here, it's time to find the fight. The fastest way is to use the Join Combat option; Command will automatically respawn you into a fight. If you want more control, you can always open the map up to find a fight, then use vehicles or the redeploy option to get there.
Use an Equipment Terminal to switch to a loadout with the Neutralizer Device equipped in the Tactical slot.
Hostile Lightning tanks are blocking our path. Armored vehicles require heavy weapons to destroy. Switch to your rocket launcher and take them out!
The percentage amount to lower game sounds when a player is speaking in voice chat.

Celebrate the holiday season with your very own Auraximas tree.

Only available during Auraximas.

Reduces fall damage, allowing you to survive falls from heights twice as high than you normally would.

Does not function while in a vehicle.
Launches several decoy flares. Disrupting lock-ons and any missiles currently tracking the vehicle.
Engineer and New Conglomerate Warden, Hadley, plays an expensive game in order to expand his legacy.

No players in this squad.

You can move players in other squads to this one by selecting them in the squad list and then selecting this squad.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.225 seconds.
Decreases the stationary fall rate of the Reaver by 16 KPH.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.
Increases resupply amount and range of Ammo Kits by 10%
Move more quickly at critical health levels.

Thank you for participating in the Planetside 2 Beta.
Follow us on Twitter or visit the forums for updates.
The powerful TS4 Haymaker features a large magazine, allowing for sustained fire without needing to reload. TR use only.
Increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 5 standard size magazines.
A VS control node is under attack!

Prompted by the festive charcoal-nosed observer drone on Sanctuary, the time has arrived to deliver the Auraximas gifts to the vendors of Sanctuary. Go forth and collect the brightly-wrapped fruits of your labor from beneath the large oxygen-generating biomass and see them to their new owners.
OR Deposit Cortium into an allied Silo at a Staging Site
The Deca is well regarded among sharpshooters due to its ability to line up long range shots that most other scopes would find daunting.
Prevent the Vanu Sovereignty from locking Hossin
Standard Terran Republic Light Assault Helmet
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.

Unlocks access to Nano-Repair Grenades. Combat Medic only.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Play with the hearts of your enemies (?) using this lovingly crafted Archer Anti-Materiel rifle variant. All factions can use NS weapons.
You were moved to a different squad.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%; and infantry rockets and light anti-vehicle explosives by 20%.
Further increases the size of the Nano-Efficient Cloak's capacitor.
